description: Try our easy to follow Sumo Citrus® Mandarin Mexican Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sumo Citrus® Mandarin Mexican Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dressing and let it marinate for 2 hours in the refrigerator, serve at room temperature with corn chips, wraps, tacos, salads, grills and more.
